Hi everyone,
I have a need to insert a javascript that is visible only in the pages of the site and NOT in the blog (blog listing and blog post).
I tried to write something like:
`{% if templateType == 'page' %}`
....
`{% endif %}`
but it doesn't work :-(
Any ideas?
Thanks

```{% if !group.id %}
....
{% endif %}```
Try this. Haven't tested it, but group.id should only be present on blogs

Hi Bradley,
many thanks, it works!!!
